citation: Proclamation under the Fire Service Amendment Act 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Fire Service Amendment Act 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Fire Service Amendment Act 2012 fix 30 April 2013 as the day on which that Act commences.

8 April 2013

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. J. O'BYRNE

Minister for Police and Emergency Management

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 April 2013

This proclamation is administered by the Tasmania Fire Service.
